channel.title: Hockey stick revenue growth
channel.description:
Saw a tweet recently about ConvertKit closing in on $2m ARR. It wasn't long ago I remembered seeing Nathan write about hitting $30k per month, so I did some digging and reading on old blog posts.
From $1k to $30k to $170k in about 3 years. Insane!
http://nathanbarry.com/30k/
https://convertkit.baremetrics.com/#start_date=2013-03-03&end_date=2016-03-19
A few takeaways:
1. The power of cold calling 2. Being 'invested' 3. Hard work
One other thing that jumped out in 30k post was zero profit on $30k revenue which seems shocking but I guess growth dollars can eat profit quickly during ramp up.

item.title: Hockey stick revenue growth
item.dc:creator: pjc
item.description:
Nathan is an absolute winner indeed. I show his metrics to everyone on my team, to show how it’s possible to bootstrap a foundation for a while that goes exponential eventually.

Read full topic

item.title: Hockey stick revenue growth
item.dc:creator: dgrigg
item.description:
Saw a tweet recently about ConvertKit closing in on $2m ARR. It wasn’t long ago I remembered seeing Nathan write about hitting $30k per month, so I did some digging and reading on old blog posts.

From $1k to $30k to $170k in about 3 years. Insane!

http://nathanbarry.com/30k/

convertkit.baremetrics.com

ConvertKit’s Revenue Dashboard on Baremetrics

View ConvertKit’s actual subscription revenue metrics: Monthly Recurring Revenue, Lifetime Value, Churn, Run Rate and more!

A few takeaways:

  1. The power of cold calling
  2. Being ‘invested’
  3. Hard work

One other thing that jumped out in 30k post was zero profit on $30k revenue which seems shocking but I guess growth dollars can eat profit quickly during ramp up.

Read full topic
